name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile showing upper teeth. Often conveys general happiness and good-natured amusement.

name: Red Heart
description: A classic red love heart emoji, used to express love and affection.

name: Fire
description: A flame, used to convey something is cool, awesome, exciting, or 'on fire'.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: A face laughing so hard it’s crying. Often used for something extremely funny.

name: Pleading Face
description: A face with large puppy-dog eyes, often used to plead or beg.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval, agreement, or encouragement.

name: Party Popper
description: A party popper with confetti and streamers, used to celebrate events or achievements.

name: Birthday Cake
description: A cake with candles, used to celebrate birthdays or other special occasions.

name: Rocket
description: A rocket ship blasting off. Can indicate fast progress or success.

name: Glowing Star
description: A glowing five-pointed star, often used to indicate fame, excellence, or something special.
